text: Tasmātiha bhikkhave citte cittānupassī tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ
edit: Tasmātiha bhikkhave citte cittānupassī tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharati ātāpī sampajāno satimā vineyya loke abhijjhādomanassaṃ

translations.transtext: Therefore, monks, in that occasion [that] monk lives, being one who see a mind in the mind, strenuous, thoughtful, mindful, removing avarice and grief in the world.
